function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Strong and statistically significant correlation between prevalence of obesity and COVID-19 mortality rate","Impact":"Increased risk of higher COVID-19 fatality rates in areas with high obesity prevalence","Mitigation":"Promote public health initiatives to reduce obesity rates and increase awareness of the link between obesity and COVID-19","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, education programs, community interventions","People":"Population with high obesity prevalence, public health agencies, local government, health organizations","Owner":"Public health agencies, local government, health organizations"},{"Description":"Negative correlation between residential density and COVID-19 fatality rate","Impact":"Risk of misinterpretation and mismanagement of public health policies related to urban planning and residential density","Mitigation":"Ensure comprehensive analysis of factors influencing COVID-19 fatality rates, including residential density, before implementing policies","Technologies":"Data analytics, spatial analysis, urban planning tools","People":"Policy makers, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Policy makers, urban planners, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Variations in associations between COVID-19 fatality rate and obesity across different counties","Impact":"Risk of overlooking county-specific factors influencing the relationship between obesity and COVID-19 fatality rate","Mitigation":"Conduct county-specific analysis to understand local determinants of COVID-19 fatality rates and obesity prevalence","Technologies":"Local data collection, statistical modeling, epidemiological studies","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, local health departments","Owner":"Public health agencies, local government, research institutions"}]}
